Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:8#2011#armored hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:8#2021#caiman mercenaries}, {@LinkCreature:8#2031#gula slavers} and {@LinkCreature:8#2041#taskmasters}, {@LinkCreature:8#2042#caiman guards}, {@LinkCreature:8#2051#devan acolytes}, and {@LinkCreature:8#2061#auric imps}.

Report to Narisa at the Avenger Outpost when mission is complete.

Oh, good, another completed mission order. I love when people bring these to me.

This is for your trouble.
You don't seem to understand how this mission order thing works. You go out and do what it says. Only then do you get a reward.
